inclusion.criterion: mother's lack of a health problem from a metabolic and endocrine perspective related to nutrition
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: absence of diagnosed psychiatric story of the mother
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: mother's openness to communication and cooperation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mother's volunteering to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: absence of breast trauma in mother (mastitis, abscess etc.)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: mother's milk analysis at least a week before without taking any medication
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: having body mass index at normal values (18.5 to 24.9) pre-pregnancy (WHO, 2015)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Having a condition that obstacle for breastfeeding (craniofacial abnormality such as cleft palate, cleft lip, paralysis of facial muscles)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome and is treating with GH. She is obese and mentally retarded.
